paper_title.ja: The shape of the dust-likeness locus of self-similar sets

paper_title.en: The shape of the dust-likeness locus of self-similar sets
Cross ratio coordinates for the deformation spaces of a marked mÖbius group

description.en: We introduce a new kind of coordinate systems for the deformation space of a finitely generated free Möbius group by using cross ratio functions induced by the fixed points of Möbius transformations. As an application, we give a new complete distance on the Schottky space by using such functions, which is not greater than the Teichmüller distance. © 2013 American Mathematical Society.
